subtitle: Add a new scene recorder where you can record your model in a large variety of formats.
description:
This plugin adds a new scene recorder that allows you to record your model and scene in a large variety of formats. Using this plugin is very similar to using the built-in GIF Recorder.

You can find the Record Scene... button in the View > Screenshot menu.

Formats

  • GIF
    • Record animated GIFs in higher quality than the built-in GIF Recorder
  • MP4
    • Record an MP4 video
  • WebM
    • Record a WebM video
  • WebP
    • Record an animated WebP image
  • APNG
    • Record an animated PNG image
  • PNG Image Sequence
    • Output each frame as an individual PNG image
